body_html: It should certainly say "reuse=False" not "reuse=None" (that's been changed a long time ago). Nowadays (starting with TF 1.4) you can actually set "reuse=tf.AUTO_REUSE" and the error will go away in all circumstances (changing True/False can be tricky). Maybe it's worth mentioning that in the message and suggesting AUTO_REUSE?

body: It should certainly say "reuse=False" not "reuse=None" (that's been changed a long time ago). Nowadays (starting with TF 1.4) you can actually set "reuse=tf.AUTO_REUSE" and the error will go away in all circumstances (changing True/False can be tricky). Maybe it's worth mentioning that in the message and suggesting AUTO_REUSE?
